page.description: Specify the value to be stored in the field when it is edited using a 'Switch' control and the 'Switch' is in the 'off' position.

figure.title: A Off Value of 'No' set by a switch

section.description: By default, the 'On value' is set to read 'No' for Character data types and 0 for Numeric data types.
To change the 'Off value' simply enter the desired value next to the control.
This will be the new value displayed when the switch is on the 'Off' position.
